name: Microphage
description:
Guide your Macrophages to eat all Bacteria. They move by their own rules, you can only flip the tiles with their food, agar, to make sure they get the job done.

Use the "How To" in the bottom right ingame to get explanations on the mechanics.

Rules are here too, just in case:

  • Click a tile to flip it, along with the agar 
  • Your Macrophages come in 3 sizes, same as the bacteria (color coded)
  • A Macrophage will always attack the bacteria, but only succeed if they are at least as big
  • Macrophages will split on agar crossings, or merge if they are the same size and want to go to the same tile
  • if a small Macrophage tries it split, it vanishes
